traits.name: Fire Absorption
entries: Whenever the giant strider is subjected to fire damage, it takes no damage and regains a number of hit points equal to half the fire damage dealt.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Fire Burst {@recharge 5}
entries: The giant strider hurls a gout of flame at a point it can see within 60 feet of it. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 (4d6 damage) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The fire spreads around corners, and it ignites flammable objects in that area that aren't being worn or carried.
